body.name: KOORUI 27 Inch Full HD Gaming Monitor 165Hz, 1ms, 3000:1, DCI-P3 90% Color Gamut, FreeSync G-Sync Compatible, (1920 x 1080, HDMI, DisplayPort) Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 36 mins
features: EXCEPTIONAL PICTURE QUALITY: The 27 inch FHD(1920*1080) display with the DCI-P3 90% wide color gamut brings what you’re watching to life in over 16.7M colors. Besides, Gaming monitor with high color accuracy, no fading phenomenon, the colors of all angles are more realistic, detailed and consistent. Thus you can get the same image quality from any angle.

SMOOTHEST GAMING EXPERIENCE: Gaming Monitor combines a refresh rate of 165Hz with FreeSync, thus enabling smooth gaming sessions. Use game mode to view details in the dark. Players can shoot to attack or defend enemies hiding in the shadows and Precise Positioning improves hit rate.

MODERN AND MINIMALISTIC DESIGN: The Computer Monitor combines exquisite craftsmanship with modern design and brings an ultra-thin body. The stand adopts a mechanism that can be quickly assembled, allows you to adjust tilt, while VESA Wall-Mountable allows you to mount your computer monitor in any environment.

MULTIPLE PORTS: KOORUI monitors provide video interfaces via HDMI and Display ports. This gaming monitor is with 165Hz refresh rate (compatible with most normal graphics cards) and FHD 1920*1080p resolution. You can connect the edge-less monitor to Xbox, PC and laptops etc, transmitting high-quality images, any switch between office and entertainment.

RELIABLE MONITOR: KOORUI owns super strength from monitor quality to premium service, making you assured. With a 3-year warranty, a 12-month replacement service and calling technical support. If you find any damage, malfunction or missing accessories, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This refurbished monitor works perfectly and was a great addition for a 2nd monitor.
reviews.reviewText: This monitor boasts a sleek design with minimal bezels, a brilliantly bright display, and a blazing-fast 144Hz refresh rate, all wrapped up in the perfect size for an immersive and visually stunning experience. I got this as a 2nd monitor now I'm thinking about getting another so they both match.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing 2k monitor, amazing price
reviews.reviewText: Great quality 2k monitor with solid refresh rate for a cheap cost. Have not had any issues in months. My more expensive monitors give me more problems than this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bad ghosting, horrible starting colors.
reviews.reviewText: Yes, the ghosting is very bad. For gaming, the darker colors like blacks and greys will smudge a lot. Other colors are alright, but still blur. It also has this weird glossyish effect that I personally do not like, and this weird horizontal pattern. But other than that, the 1440p is very nice in game, and the 144hz is smooth. But DO NOT buy a VA Panel for gaming. IT IS NOT WORTH IT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know what other people are talking about this monitor looks great if you mess with your settings you can get it to look even better I definitely recommend this to anyone also it’s advertised at 144hz but mine has a 165hz option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A few months after purchasing, horizontal white lines appear on screen
reviews.reviewText: I've had this monitor for about 2 months now. It worked fine, other than a little bit of ghosting when playing games. As of today there are small horizontal white lines going across the screen. I've reset the monitor settings, tried other cables (both display port and HDMI). I also tried with my other monitor and a tv, and both do not display the lines, so it is 100% an issue with the monitor.Going to see if I can get a repair or replacement through the manufacturer. I'll update if I get any results.Otherwise I would steer away from this monitor and company.UPDATE 8/27/2023:I submitted a support ticket through their website and received a response to my support ticket in late July, asking for images of the monitor issue as well as a screenshot of my order confirmation. I sent the images over, and haven't heard anything back in about a month. I just took a look at the email and it's coming from a general gmail account - which is concerning. There wasn't any crazy identifying information in the images I sent over, but it's VERY suspicious that the support email came from a general gmail account and not anything official. I also haven't heard anything back since sending the information.Needless to say, even more than before I'm very suspicious of this company and would recommend to stay away from their products, I'm at the point where I've written off this monitor as a loss and just got a different one from a reputable brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 stars once you get the settings correct.
reviews.reviewText: Out of the box this thing was horrible. But after a lot of adjusting and playing with the settings finally got it looking really good. The defaults settings it looks about like a old RGB from the 80's ok maybe not that bad but bad. However, with a little love and patience you can get this bad boy looking great. So when you consider the price still have to give it 5 stars. Best under 200 2k monitor ur going to find with 144hz refresh rate. Trust me iv looked and looked. The one that's slightly cheaper only has 1 year warranty that was deal killer for me. If it only comes with a 1 year that says a lot. This one has 3 years so at least they have faith enough to replace it for that long. It came in the sturdiest monitor box I think I've seen to date. then double boxed on top of that, 5 stars on their shipping dept also. It could have used a hair more brightness. Ability on the top, end. But that's it other than the horrible out of the box settings. You have to really play with the settings to get it right, but it's worth it, looks good once you get there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best picture and smoothness
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best screen I have ever seen. With the matte screen, you don't have to worry about glare all that much. I'd rather use this than my TV any day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good but minor ghosting
reviews.reviewText: It looks great but the ghosting is a little annoying at first but an overall great budget monitor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Went up a whole division on my game of choice, getting rid of 60ms input delay of my old TV felt better than an upgrade to my internet. Night and day difference, and great colour consistency for editing work too, in addition to the mighty frame rates. No clue how the y are such great value.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sehr guter Bildschirm in der Preisklasse
reviews.reviewText: Ich Habe den Bildschirm Ende Dezember 2022 gekauft, da ich zu Weihnachten die Xbox Series X bekomme habe und der alte Monitor mit 22 Zoll erstmal zu klein, aber mit 60hz, FHD und schlechter LED Hintergrundbeleuchtung auch zu schlecht war. Vorallem für das, was die Xbox eigentlich her gibt. Ich habe lange recherchiert und bin dann zu dem Entschluss gekommen, diesen Bildschirm zu kaufen, da er mir echt gut zugesagt hat und die Bewertungen anderer Nutzer hier meist positiv ausgefallen sind. Ich muss sagen, ich kann auch fast nur positives zum Monitor sagen.Positiv:-Mir war vor dem Kauf bewusst, dass der Bildschirm nur entweder 120hz bei 1080p hergibt oder eben die vollen 1440p bei nur 60hz. Ich hatte erst meine Bedenken dass das Bild bei 1080p und 120hz vielleicht etwas zu verpixelt wird, da der Bildschirm mit 27 Zoll natürlich etwas größer ist als mein alter 22 Zoll Monitor. Ich muss aber sagen, dass es trotzdem nicht schlecht aussieht und das bei Shooter games sowieso nicht wirklich auffällt, da dort die 120fps viel wichtiger sind. Bei anderen games die keine 120fps unterstützen schalte ich dann einfach auf der Xbox auf 1440p 60hz um.-Das Bild sieht gut aus und die Farben werden sehr gut dargestellt. Nach ein bisschen einstellen und rumprobieren hab ich das Bild dann so wie ich es haben wollte hinbekommen.-Der Monitor hat einen Audio-Out Klinkenanschluss der auch gut funktioniert. An High-end Anlagen wird der nicht ausreichen klangtechnisch aber für meine Zwecke vollkommen ausreichend.-Aufbau ist einfach hinzubekommen und geht recht schnell.-Der Standfuß ist ist recht groß, aber hält dadurch den Monitor auch sehr sehr gut, er kommt nicht leicht ins wackeln.-Man kann den Monitor in alle Richtungen drehen und hoch und runter schieben, was wirklich sehr praktisch ist. Es geht nicht zu leicht, aber auch nicht zu schwer, von daher sehr gut umgesetzt.-Recht niedriger und daher guter Preis für einen WQHD 144hz Bildschirm.Negativ:-Die Stecker für alles sind unterhalb des Monitors. Man muss also entweder den Monitor auf den Tisch legen oder ganz hochschieben, wobei das ganz hochschieben auch nicht wirklich praktisch und leicht zum reinstecken der Kabel ist. Die hätte man an die Seite packen müssen.-Ich habe die Farben des Bildschirms zwar gelobt, allerdings hätte ich mir noch ein paar Einstellungen zum Bild mehr gewünscht.Das sind so meine Eindrücke nach ca. 3 Wochen Nutzung an der Xbox Series X. Ich hoffe ich kann mit meiner Bewertung manchen von euch die Entscheidung beim Kauf etwas erleichtern. :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Monitor de computadora de buena calidad

reviews.reviewText: Ich habe diesen Monitor für 180€ am Primeday gekauft und es war der günstigste 27" QHD Bildschirm mit 1ms Reaktionszeit,144Hz und IPS Panel.Das Bild ist super da das Display QHD Auflösung und ein IPS Panel hat.Der Bildschirm hat leider keine Lautsprecher aber steht ja auch nicht dabei nur in den Einstellungen kann man die Lautstärke einstellen und leider wird am Computer auch ein Lautsprecher wahrgenommes aber nicht der Fall ist.So gibts eingentlich nichts zum aussetzten hab die Monitore aber auch erst 2 Wochen im Einsatz.Das einzige was mich richtig stört ich habe 2 von denen aber die sind um 0.5cm unterschiedlich hoch.
